entry.title: A Buddie Christmas - Image Fill
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: A recently single firefighter returns to his small town stays in LA at Christmas time because he has to work and falls in love with a single dad and his adorable son. The elf in town helps him realise he has a beautiful family.This is an fan graphic for a Christmas movie style poster/DVD/Video cover for a Hallmark style Buddie Christmas movie.PROMPT 17 - CHRISTMAS MOVIES

entry.title: Christmas Jokes + Plastic Frogs + Water = Love
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 959Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: â€œHow do you know that?â€ asks Ravi. â€œMidnight Wikipedia deep dive,â€ Eddie answers as Buck passes him the box to look at. Ravi raises an eyebrow, â€œRight, but how do you even know the topic to look it up?â€ â€œOh I didnâ€™t. I started by looking up something about raccoons and sugar cookies and then the spiral began and I ended up looking at different Christmas traditions around the world and finished with learning about the Emu War of Australia,â€ Buck says as the team pokes around in the gift basket to see what else Brad has put in for them and Eddie opens the box of crackers. Brad Torrence sends the 118 a gift hamper for their Christmas celebration and includes some Christmas Crackers for the team to try - silly Christmas Dad jokes and potentially a few too many spiked drinks results in a quiet moment for Buck and Eddie. PROMPT 16 - CHRISTMAS CRACKERS

entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,998Chapters: 18/22Kudos: 218

Summary: Buck: emails in the study hall, quiet exchanges and silent jokes, adorable and charismatic and a retired firefighter turned college student. also, unbearably hot.Firehose: the hot voice on the phone that's currently helping navigate Eddie through his blooming sexuality crisis.Eddie might be developing feelings for both of them.Little does he know the two might be closer to each other than he thinks. or: Eddie's a college professor. Buck goes to said college after the engine crushed his leg and he had to quit his dream job at the 118.Buck starts working for a phone sex hotline. Eddie calls said hotline. Romance, misunderstandings, and humor ensues. [updates every Thursday]

entry.title: everything is fucking great
entry.summary:
Author: sterekdiva

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,844Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 60

Summary: â€œDad, promise youâ€™ll be back for dinner?â€ Christopherâ€™s words echoed in his ears. â€œIâ€™m short a man tonight,â€ Bobby continued, cutting through his thoughts. â€œTwo, actually. One called in sick, the otherâ€™s stuck out of town. Ravi agreed to fill in for one.â€ â€œIâ€¦ I canâ€™t, Cap. Iâ€™m sorry. I promised my kid I'd be at dinner tonight,â€ Eddie sighed, fighting the urge to check his watch again. Bobby nodded, like heâ€™d expected that response â€œI get it. Family first. But if you couldâ€”â€ â€œCap, please. Itâ€™s justâ€¦ No,â€ Eddie cut in, pleading more than he meant. â€œI can't miss it. Not this year. Christopher is counting on me. He needs at least one parent tonight, and Buckâ€™s not home yet.â€ The words hung there, heavier than the chatter in the background. Bobby had known Eddie for over a year now â€”long enough to hear the stories, the mentions of Buck slipping into conversations like echoes. He had been Eddie's anchor, unseen but ever-present. â€œYeah,â€ Bobby sighed quietly. â€œI had to ask, Iâ€™m sorry.â€ Eddie managed a half-smile. â€œI know. Iâ€™m sorry, too.â€ or, a Christmas in the Buckley-Diaz household.

entry.title: As the world falls apart
entry.summary:
Author: spook1970

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,225Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 1,587

Summary: Buck is surviving. Mostly. And then the tsunami happened.----------Eddie is perpetually worried about Buck. And when Buck sends a photo of Christopher and him in a ride, he thinks nothing of it.Then, in the middle of climbing a half-submerged Ferris Wheel he realized that his family was here. On this death trap of a pier, not even ten minutes before the first wave.Eddie's panicking, Buck's fighting to survive, and Christopher is traumatized.

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,183Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 261

Summary: After the shitshow thatâ€™s been his life for the past few months, Eddie decides that the best way to move forward is to outsource his life decisions to Buck - after all, Buck has always known how to manage Eddieâ€™s life better than Eddie could. And if it prevents Buck from moving out, then all the better. Buck is trying to find a new apartment before he gets too comfortable in the Diaz home, but Eddie keeps asking him for things he wants too much to say no to. All he wants is to not hurt anyone, but Eddie seems to be determined to make that impossible. All the while, thereâ€™s Christopher, the firehouse, and the love of it all.

Summary: Eddieâ€™s just trying to fix his leaky kitchen sink when his sister bursts in waving her phone, yelling about a viral TikTok. What she shows him stops him cold: Buck, on stage, cowboy hat tipped low, singing a heartbreak song. What follows is a spectacular mix of bad timing, mutual pining, and emotional repression so thick it should come with a warning label. Both men are forced to face the feelings theyâ€™ve been pretending donâ€™t existâ€”Buckâ€™s for the man he thinks he canâ€™t have, and Eddieâ€™s for the truth heâ€™s spent his whole life running from.
